p: In order to provide information about differences in magnitude between DENV and CHIKV infections rates, information of all DENV confirmed infections were obtained through 2014 and from January to July of 2015 Dengue national surveillance program, as well as all CHIKV confirmed cases. In brief, incidence rates of CHIKV and DENV infection in 2014 and 2015 were calculated dividing the number of positive cases per 100,000 inhabitants using demographic information of General Comptroller of the Republic of Panama.[ 22]
